institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 1 (Purpose)
contents: Article 1 (Purpose) This rule applies to Article 145, Paragraph 3, Item 13 of the Enforcement Decree of the Employment Insurance Act, Article 52, Paragraph 2, Item 4 of the Enforcement Decree of the National Lifelong Vocational Skills Development Act, and the National Human Resources Development Consortium Operation Regulations (hereinafter referred to as *regulations). The purpose is to stipulate the matters necessary for the National Human Resources Development Consortium project (hereinafter referred to as *Consortium Project) entrusted to the Human Resources Development Service of Korea (hereinafter referred to as *Consortium Project). Revised 2022. 6. 28.
